conversation.text: What role are you currently in, or what are you looking for next?
How many years of experience do you need?
What's the salary range you're offering?
Is it remote, onsite, or hybrid?
How urgently do you want to fill it?
What kind of personality fits best?
Would you consider part-time or freelance?
Do you have a JD file or quick summary?

About the Role: We are looking for a passionate and experienced Software Development Engineer II (SDE-2) to join our dynamic engineering team. As an SDE-2, you will be responsible for designing, developing, testing, and maintaining high-quality software solutions. Youâ€™ll work closely with cross-functional teams to build scalable systems, drive best practices, and mentor junior engineers.  Key Responsibilities: Design and implement scalable, maintainable, and performant backend or frontend systems.  Collaborate with Product Managers, Designers, and other Engineers to define, design, and deliver new features.  Take ownership of components or services, from design to deployment.  Participate in code reviews and uphold high standards of code quality and architecture.  Diagnose performance issues and fix bugs to ensure a smooth user experience.  Mentor junior developers and help them grow technically.  Write unit, integration, and end-to-end tests.  Contribute to engineering processes, tools, and standards.

aiReply: Based on our discussion, I understand that you're seeking a passionate and experienced SDE-2 to join your remote team, ideally with 5 years of experience. The role is immediate due to an urgent requirement, and the salary range for this role is between 18 lakhs. You're looking for someone who can design, develop, test, and maintain high-quality software solutions, mentor junior engineers, and uphold high standards of code quality and architecture. It's great to know that you consider part-time or freelance opportunities as well. I've logged this internally and will surface suitable profiles soon, flagging urgent ones first.
